lead_paragraph: The unseeded American Jamea Jackson beat the defending champion Maria Sharapova, 6-4, 6-4, to become a surprise finalist at the Birmingham Classic in London. Jackson will face the Russian Vera Zvonareva, who defeated Meilen Tu of the United States in the other semifinal.
